name: CatYeet!
description:
a game about a donkey and his cute cat companion going on adventures and solving puzzles.

Playable on windows and require a Mouse and Keyboard.

How to play: 

Use A and D or Arrow keys to move, W, space or Up arrow to jump. 

Hold Left Click and use Mouse cursur to aim, then release to shoot.

Right click to Switch between characters.

Special thanks to matinof for mental support and cover of the game.
